channel.title: The Best P2P (Peer 2 Peer) Programs!
channel.description:
[center][glow=limegreen,0,300][shadow=red,left]- The best P2P programs! -[/glow] [b]By S!ms[/b][/center]
So, i am trying to make a full list with every P2P program. Hope you like it!
[ul][li][b]Limewire PRO[/b] I think this is the best P2P sharing program. Because there is no spyware in there, amazing high download speeds and it's open source. [url=http://www.info.com.ph/~cyberray/LimeWireWin.zip]Download[/url][right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:15LwtqwKev_y0M:www.emp3world.com/download/images/limewire.jpg[/img][/right][/li]
[li][b]E-Mule[/b] A P2P program, mostly used to share video's. Also most (illegal) site's use it, so they dont have to host their files themselves. [url=http://superb-west.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/emule/eMule0.47a-Installer.exe]Download[/url][right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:hQaP9Y56h9gAUM:www.emule.org.cn/about/images/screen/001.png[/img][/right] [/li]
[li] [b]Kazaa[/b] Also a sharing program. I'm not quite sure if it's still infected with virusses! [url=http://download.kazaa.com/kazaa_setup.exe]Download[/url] [right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:HJ0PAssCa0Cw3M:www.p2pgaly.szm.sk/images/nahlad/kazaa.gif[/img][/right]
[/li]
[li][b]Soulseek[/b] Never tried it, try it yourself ;) [url=http://www.slsknet.org/slsk157test8.exe]Download[/url][right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:nadeWIPqOm15eM:www.utilidades-utiles.com/images/Download-SoulSeek.jpg[/img][/right]
[/li]
[li][b]iMesh[/b] Never used it, butta, try it :D [url=http://download.imesh.com/files/iMeshV6.exe]Download[/url] [right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:rEdfjhTIJsXCxM:www.netzwelt.de/images/articles/imesh_01_a_1123057200.jpg[/img][/right] [/li]
[li][b]Bearshare[/b] For some requests. I haven't used it myself, but it seems it rocks ;) [url=http://download.bearshare.com/BSPROINSTALL.exe]Download[/url][right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:zvmGI4TSsJd_nM:www.netzwelt.de/images/articles/bearshare_01_a_1123156882.jpg[/img][/right] [/li]
[li][b]Shareaza[/b] Another p2p network :) [url=http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/shareaza/Shareaza_2.2.1.0.exe?use_mirror=mesh]Download[/url][right][img]http://images.google.com/images?q=tbn:PLqQPxLi5Y9Y6M:www.zonep2p.pl/screen/shar16.jpg[/img][/right] [/li]
[li][b]Blubster[/b] Never heard of it. Ron did :D [url=http://www.blubster.com/download/install.htm]Download[/url][right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:0c4D6Fxg14tazM:img.clubic.com/photo/00E9000000058866.jpg[/img][/right] [/li]
[li][b]Bittorrent[/b] Finally! The best P2P program on the web! I will simply explain how it works: Ok, download it (Press download at the bottom of this topic) and install the client. then, go to [url=http://www.torrentz.com]http://www.torrentz.com[/url] (yes, i know there are more sites, i just like this one). Enter what you want in the searchbox (For example "World of Warcraft") and press [Enter] Now you should have some results. Pick one you think that's right (and one with lots of seeders ;)) and press on the title. Now look under the title "You may download this torrent from any of those trackers" and press a site. Look at the site where the [Download torrent] link available is, and save the .torrent to your desktop. Go to your Bittorrent client and press File > Open torrent. Select the .torrent you just saved, and wait until your download is finished! (It can take a while, depending on how much seeders are online) [url=http://download.bittorrent.com/dl/BitTorrent-Stable.exe]Download Bittorrent regular client[/url] // [url=http://www.utorrent.com/download/1.5/utorrent.exe]Download uTorrent[/url] // [url=http://surfnet.dl.sourceforge.net/sourceforge/azureus/Azureus_2.4.0.2_Win32.setup.exe]Download Azureus[/url][right][img]http://images.google.nl/images?q=tbn:zHqAUyJb-TiUSM:baixaki.ig.com.br/imagens/shots1/azureus-b.jpg[/img][/right] [/li][/ul]
Now, i hope you are going to use P2P technology and...SEED!! :D
~S!ms
